entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 3.x or EFClassic 6 for full framework project? #28941
  • EF Core global query filter based on nullable property resulting in NullReferenceException #28940
  • Move internal extension method classes #28938
  • The DbContext self entity tracing will affect the working of global filter on navigation properties #28936
  • ObjectDisposedException when DbContext.ChangeTracker is accessed immediately after the DbContext construction. #28935
  • [net 6.0] [linux] Microsoft.Data.SqlClient is not supported on this platform #28934
  • Mapping attribute (aka data annotation) for property mapped to JSON column #28933
    Backlog
  • Temporal tables are not supported for table splitting but no table splitting is used #28931
  • How to query array contains array with Azure CosmosDB with EFCore #28929

Closed

  • EF5 to EF6 getting 'Unable to translate set operation when matching columns on both sides have different store types.' #28865
  • 7.0 API Reviews #27588
    7.0.0-rc1
  • Calling SaveChanges multiple times sometimes throws with JSON types #28813
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Unexpected cycles detected by `BatchingTopologicalSort` in latest preview #28065
    7.0.0-rc2
  • New EF7 Optimization of Insert query fails on tables with Triggers #28897
  • Translation of method 'string.Format' failed - EF error. #28894
  • Use Custom SqlCLR Aggregate Functions in EF7 #28893
  • Simplify calls to date nested in strftime #25027
    7.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Differentiate between a sequence's database schema and model schema #28943
  • Sproc fixes #28942
  • Avoid cascade cycles on SQL Server for derived-type referencing many-to-many #28937

Merged

  • Update BenchmarkDotNet version #28901
  • SQLite Query: Simplify nested date() calls #28928
  • Fully-qualify ExpressionPrinter in DebuggerDisplay #28932
  • Stop setting JSON array entities' state to Modified in SaveChanges #28926
  • Make filtered unique index update dependencies soft so they can be broken if there's a cycle, since they might not be enforced in the database. #28923

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
  • Support sproc input/output parameters on non-concurrency-token properties #28908
